questions.name: modName
questions.message: What is the name of your mod?

requirements.message: Mod name can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, underscores, and hyphens.

questions.name: modDescription
questions.message: Provide a short description of your mod:

requirements.message: Description must be at most 255 characters.

questions.name: authorName
questions.message: Who should be credited as the author of this mod?

questions.name: modPackage
questions.message: What is the package name for your mod (e.g., com.yourname.modname)?

requirements.message: Package name must start with a letter or underscore and can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and dots.

questions.name: remoteRepoOrg
questions.message: What is the GitHub organization or username for your mod's repository?

questions.name: discordInvite
questions.message: What is the Discord invite link for your mod's community (leave blank if none)?

questions.name: useKotlin
questions.message: Would you like to use Kotlin in your mod?
